name: James Daniel
description: I describe myself as Articulate and Attractive. I am kind, fun and loyal. I have positive outlook on life and I have visions of great success and for me, failure is not an option. I enjoy traveling, fine dining as well as cooking at home. My favorite tv show is Dr.”House”. What sets me apart from the rest is my charming and enthusiastic personality ;).I especially enjoy the company of a highly intelligent lady. I appreciate a woman that is honest and believes in mentoring and is willing to give critique as well as corrective criticism. My ideal match would enjoy travelling, her work, fine dining and cooking. Meaningful conversation over dinner is important. Wouldn’t you agree?
